messages.text: Welcome to Berlin! I'm your guide, and I'm here to help you explore the city. What would you like to do today?

entities.title: Cute Shopping
entities.description: Cute mom and pop stores around you

entities.title: Kado - Liquorice Boutique
entities.description: Variety of Liquorice from EU and South America
entities.altText: A cute shop with a sign that says 'Kado - Liquorice Boutique'

entities.title: Secondhand Moons
entities.altText: A secondhand clothing store with a variety of vintage and used clothes

entities.title: Save the Cake
entities.altText: A vibrant hat shop specializing in handmade hats, showcasing a colorful array of unique and artistic headwear

entities.title: Großformat Berlin
entities.altText: A digital print shop with a variety of artistic prints and posters

entities.title: The Legacy of Albrecht Thaer in Friedrichshain
entities.altText: A street in Berlin with a sign that says 'Thaerstraße'
entities.description: Strolling through Thaerstraße in Friedrichshain, Berlin, you'll encounter a name steeped in agricultural history—Albrecht Thaer, the 'father of scientific agriculture.' Thaer's revolutionary work in soil fertility and crop rotation transformed farming into a precise science, ensuring food security for generations. His dedication to blending theory with practice is a reminder of how one man's vision can sow the seeds of progress. Explore the street that celebrates his enduring legacy in the heart of Berlin.

entities.title: Want to Try a different cuisine?
entities.description: Some of the restaurants that are very different from what you find typically in your neighbourhood

entities.title: Thänh Koch
entities.description: Specialities from the streets of Hanoi
entities.altText: A Vietnamese restaurant with a variety of dishes from the streets of Hanoi

entities.title: Bistro 1001
entities.altText: A Mediterranean restaurant with a variety of dishes from the Mediterranean region

entities.title: Biergarten am Volkspark
entities.altText: A traditional German beer garden with a variety of German beers and dishes

entities.title: Café Morgenrot
entities.altText: A vegan and vegetarian café with a variety of vegan and vegetarian dishes
